sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is not distributive over complement.
message_1:
Given sets A={2,3,4} and B={6,7}, find:

a) A complement and B complement
b) The Cartesian product of A and B
c) The complement of AxB
d) Determine whether the Cartesian product of A complement and B complement is equal to the complement of AxB.
